task_detail: Write a 1500-word blog post on the topic of sustainable living.
submission_info: Submit the post in a Google Doc to blogs@greenliving.com

task_detail: Test the new features of our mobile app on both iOS and Android platforms.
submission_info: Submit the test reports in the provided template via our testing portal.

task_detail: Manage our company's social media accounts and schedule daily posts.
submission_info: Report weekly activities and engagement metrics in the provided spreadsheet.

task_detail: Conduct a market research survey to gather data on customer preferences.
submission_info: Enter the survey results into our database and summarize key findings.

task_detail: Edit a series of promotional videos for our latest product launch.
submission_info: Upload the final edited videos to our shared drive.

task_detail: Optimize our website content for better search engine ranking.
submission_info: Submit the SEO audit report and implementation plan to seo@company.com

task_detail: Provide email support to our customers and resolve their queries.
submission_info: Log each support case and resolution in our CRM system.

task_detail: Create illustrations for a new children's book, including cover and interior pages.
submission_info: Submit the illustrations in high-resolution PDF format.

task_detail: Analyze sales data to identify trends and provide actionable insights.
submission_info: Submit the analysis report in Excel with visualizations.

task_detail: Plan and coordinate our annual corporate event, including venue booking and catering.
submission_info: Submit the event plan and timeline to events@company.com
